name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Gerald John GIOAN, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Gerald John GIOAN, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW this Twenty-first day of August, 1986, the Commonwealth’s petition for allowance of appeal is granted; the order of the Superior Court is vacated; and this matter is remanded to the Superior Court for reconsideration in light of our recent decision in Commonwealth v. Brady, 510 Pa. 123, 507 A.2d 66 (1986).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
513 A.2d 983
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Gerald John GIOAN, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 25, 1986.
